text.div:
Leptospirosis (Tests for Leptospira Antigen)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    23203-3 Leptospira sp Ag [Presence] in Tissue by Immunofluorescence
    23204-1 Leptospira sp Ag [Presence] in Tissue by Immune stain
    23750-3 Leptospira sp Ag [Presence] in Urine by Immunofluorescence
    31871-7 Leptospira interrogans Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen
    31872-5 Leptospira sp Ag [Presence] in Urine
    6452-7 Leptospira interrogans Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Immunofluorescence
    6605-0 Leptospira interrogans Ag [Presence] in Tissue by Immunofluorescence
